Package edu.rit.pjmr

Package edu.rit.pjmr contains Parallel Java Map Reduce (PJMR), a simple parallel map-reduce framework built on top of Parallel Java 2.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Source<I,C>
    Interface Source specifies the interface for a data source in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Combiner<K,V extends Vbl>
    Class Combiner provides a combiner in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.
    Customizer<K,V extends Vbl>
    Class Customizer is the base class for a customizer in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.
    Mapper<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>
    Class Mapper is the abstract base class for a mapper in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.
    MapperConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>
    Class MapperConfig contains specifications for configuring a Mapper in a mapper task.
    MapperTask<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>
    Class MapperTask provides a mapper task in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.
    MapperTaskConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>
    Class MapperTaskConfig contains specifications for configuring a mapper task.
    PjmrJob<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>
    Class PjmrJob is the abstract base class for a map-reduce job in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.
    Reducer<K,V extends Vbl>
    Class Reducer is the abstract base class for a reducer in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.
    ReducerConfig<K,V extends Vbl>
    Class ReducerConfig contains specifications for configuring a Reducer in a reducer task.
    ReducerTask<K,V extends Vbl>
    Class ReducerTask provides a reducer task in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.
    ReducerTaskConfig<K,V extends Vbl>
    Class ReducerTaskConfig contains specifications for configuring a reducer task.
    SourceConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>
    Class SourceConfig contains specifications for configuring a Source in a mapper task.
    TextDirectorySource
    Class TextDirectorySource provides a data source that obtains data records from multiple files in a directory.
    TextFileSource
    Class TextFileSource provides a data source that obtains data records from a file.
    TextId
    Class TextId provides a data record ID returned by a TextFileSource.

Package edu.rit.pjmr Description

Package edu.rit.pjmr contains Parallel Java Map Reduce (PJMR), a simple parallel map-reduce framework built on top of Parallel Java 2. PJMR uses Parallel Java 2's capabilities to run map-reduce computations on multicore parallel computers, cluster parallel computers, and hybrid multicore cluster parallel computers.

Refer to class PjmrJob for documentation on programming PJMR map-reduce jobs.

PJMR is inspired by Apache's Hadoop, but is considerably simpler. PJMR omits most of Hadoop's advanced features, such as fault tolerance, speculative execution, and the Hadoop Distributed File System.
